question.ask: Questions 3~4  Suppose a famous astronaut is making a report in your school. You work as a student representative. Ask him two questions about his job.

std.value: What is the most difficult part in your work? What qualities are very important to an astronaut?
std.ai: What is the most difficult part in your work? What qualities are very important to an astronaut?

std.value: How do you like your job? Is it possible for an ordinary student like me to become an astronaut?
